directions: Blend 1/2 cup walnuts, dates, cinnamon, and cardamom together in a blender until almost smooth. Roll mixture into little balls. Place finely chopped walnuts in a shallow bowl and roll balls in walnuts to coat. Store balls in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon finely chopped walnuts, or to taste
title: Raw Food Snacks - Cinnamon Bun Balls
